originalText.text: Absolutely loved the engagement my fiance planned with Enchanting Engagements. It was gorgeous and in a special spot to us in Central Park. They helped him plan it and make it sentimental to us. They helped with every detail and took gorgeous photos and video to document it. And they brought a lot of excitement to it too with their positive attitudes. Thank you for everything!

text.text: Absolutely loved the engagement my fiance planned with Enchanting Engagements. It was gorgeous and in a special spot to us in Central Park. They helped him plan it and make it sentimental to us. They helped with every detail and took gorgeous photos and video to document it. And they brought a lot of excitement to it too with their positive attitudes. Thank you for everything!

originalText.text: Enchanting Engagements transformed my proposal into an unforgettable moment in the heart of New York City. Their meticulous planning and attention to detail created a magical ambiance that perfectly complemented the romantic backdrop of the city. From the stunning decor to the seamless coordination, every element was thoughtfully curated. The team's professionalism and creativity exceeded my expectations, ensuring that the moment my fiancée said "yes" was nothing short of enchanting. The personalized touch and flawless execution made our engagement an experience we'll cherish forever. Enchanting Engagements turned a special occasion into a fairytale, and I couldn't be more grateful for their exceptional service.

originalText.text: Thank you Enchanting Engagements for the most magical breathtaking experience ever. My proposal was a dream come true. It couldn’t have been any better. Your staff was also very amazing, friendly and inviting. They communicated well from the beginning to the end. I would recommend anyone to book for their fairytale experience.

text.text: Thank you Enchanting Engagements for the most magical breathtaking experience ever. My proposal was a dream come true. It couldn’t have been any better. Your staff was also very amazing, friendly and inviting. They communicated well from the beginning to the end. I would recommend anyone to book for their fairytale experience.

originalText.text: I was so elated that my fiancè was able to pull our engagement off the way he did and I know he couldn’t have done it without the help of Enchanting Engagements. Our set up was gorgeous and our photographer was so kind. We were able to enjoy our time together after the engagement, pop a bottle on the roof with a skyline view, and take photos after the initial proposal so we could keep the memories forever. Highly recommend!

Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude and appreciation for the incredible job you did in planning and executing my surprise proposal. Everything was absolutely perfect, and I couldn't have asked for a more magical and unforgettable experience.

I was completely blown away by the thoughtfulness and attention to detail that went into every aspect of the proposal. The choice of music, the exquisite floral arrangements, and the meticulous documentation of the special moments captured everything I could have ever imagined. It truly felt like a fairytale come to life.

But beyond the stunning aesthetics, what truly made this experience exceptional was the warmth and friendliness of your team. From the very first meeting, I felt like you genuinely cared about making me feel special. Your dedication and commitment to ensuring that every little detail was taken care of did not go unnoticed. It truly felt as though I was the only person in the world that mattered to you.

Please extend my heartfelt thanks and appreciation to everyone involved in creating such a perfect evening. Your professionalism, creativity, and passion shine through in every aspect of your work, and I am eternally grateful for the memories you have helped create. I will cherish them forever.

Once again, thank you for making this milestone in our lives so incredibly special. I will wholeheartedly recommend Enchanting Engagements to anyone seeking to create their own magical moment.
